# simd_mix(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Returns an element-wise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_mix(_ x: simd_float4, _ y: simd_float4, _ t: simd_float4) -> simd_float4
```

## Interpolation Functions

- **mix(_:_:t:)**: Returns an element-wise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.
- **mix(_:_:t:)**: Returns an element-wise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.
- **simd_smoothstep(_:_:_:)**: Returns an element-wise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.
- **smoothstep(_:edge0:edge1:)**: Returns an element-wise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.
